title: Bedford Natural Medicine
description: Dr. Kristen O'Dell is a naturopath serving Bedford, NH, and surrounding towns. Dr. O'Dell will work with you to formulate a customized plan.
cleaned_text: The mission of BNM is to provide quality personal medical care that is effective and complete. Your health story is an important part of providing an individualized treatment plan. A plan to reverse disease and maintain optimal health. Are you ready to take control of your health and embrace the healing power within? I love what I do. People often look to Naturopathic Medicine after not finding-- [ Read More>> ](about/#meet-the-doctor) Everything you need for a detoxifying cleanse.
